book_start: Book Builder initialized. What's your topic and audience?
course_start: Course Builder ready. How many modules do you need?
framework_start: Framework Builder activated. What's the methodology?
archive_start: Archive Builder online. What knowledge are we organizing?
outline_ready: Outline complete. Review and approve, then we'll draft.
drafting: Drafting in progress. This will take a few minutes.
review_ready: Draft complete. Review, edit, then finalize.
publishing: Preparing for publication. Choose your format and platform.
complete: Project complete. Ready for the world.
save_progress: Progress saved. You can resume anytime.
export_options: Export options: PDF, DOCX, EPUB, or web format.
